column1: Reward Points: Earn 1 Point per $, 1 Point is worth $0.05

column23: Discount from Standard with Rewards used

column1: I think for the potential super high volume users (Diamond & Ruby Tier) instead of lowering price or giving additional reward points, we can give exclusive & invite only events/dinners/experiences to bring added value, loyalty, and prestige to reward them for their high usage.

I also think that the hypothetical Ruby Tier should either not exist or not be published. Maintaining company margins, value, and pricing integrity is important. I also think that giving the extra 2 or 3 reward points per dollar is too aggressive and further cuts our pricing integrity/value too low. My preference is 1 Point Per $1.
